Primary Contact: Adriana Scuka, B.S., M.A., SLP(C), Registered Speech Language Pathologist
Service Details: - Offers speech and language consultation, assessments, individual and group therapy, parent/caregiver education and  to preschool children, school aged children and adults- Provides education/consultation to preschool staff and teachers- Provides services and programs to those with speech difficulties, oral motor difficulties, language delay, fluency (stuttering), voice and resonance problems, hearing loss, cochlear implants, aphasia, head injury, developmental delays and accent reduction- Service areas include Aphasia and head injury, Autism, child language delay, cognitive impairment, diagnostics, early intervention, hearing-related speech and language difficulties, motor speech disorders, and voice/resonance problems
Eligibility: Individual and group therapy servicing to all age groups
How to Apply: Please contact for more information and to apply
